sys_ui_macro.description: A label format function. Since you cannot use DOM element editing in load scripts.
sys_ui_macro.name: format_multiple_labels
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script type="text/javascript">
		(function(document, jQuery){
		  function flatten(keys, obj, delimiter) {
			var arr = [];
			for (var i=0;i${AMP}lt;keys.length;i++) {
			  var array = obj[keys[i]];
			  for (var f=0;f${AMP}lt;array.length;f++) {
			  arr.push('element.x_momo_inc_rvw_review.' + keys[i] + delimiter + array[f]);
			  }
			}
			return arr;
		  }
		  function formatLabels() {
			var fields = {
			  'u_review_bool': [
				'articles_sent',
				'phone_call',
				'client_availability',
				'appr_resp',
				'back_forth',
				'resp_time',
				'synopsis',
				'resolve_permission',
				'timely_resolve'
			  ],
			  'u_transfer_bool': [
				'ack',
				'dept_contact',
				'detailed_work'
			  ]
			};

			var field_keys = Object.keys(fields);


			var flat = flatten(field_keys, fields, '_');
			for (var index=0;index${AMP}lt;flat.length;index++) {
			  var elem = document.getElementById(flat[index]);
			  if (elem) {
				var children = elem.children;
				var label_div = children[0].children;
				var label = label_div[0];
				var l_classList = label.classList;
				label.style = 'text-align:left;';
				l_classList.remove('col-md-1_5', 'col-lg-2', 'col-xs-12');

				l_classList.add('col-xs-12');
				l_classList.add('col-md-4');
				l_classList.add('col-lg-3');

				var input = children[1];

				var i_classList = input.classList;
				i_classList.remove('col-xs-10', 'col-md-9', 'col-lg-8');
				i_classList.add('col-xs-12');
				i_classList.add('col-md-3');
				i_classList.add('col-lg-3');
			  }
			}
		  }

		  function formatForeignLabels() {
			var foreign_fields = {
			  'incident': [
				'caller_id',
				'assignment_group',
				'assigned_to',
				'short_description'
			  ]
			};

			var foreign_keys = Object.keys(foreign_fields);

			var foreign = flatten(foreign_keys, foreign_fields, '.');
			for (var findex=0;findex${AMP}lt;foreign.length;findex++) {
			  var parent = document.getElementById(foreign[findex]);
			  var child = parent.children[2];
			  child.innerHTML = '${AMP}lt;!-- Erased default addon for ' + foreign[findex] + '--${AMP}gt;';
			}
		  }


		  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
			formatLabels();
			formatForeignLabels();
		  })
	  })(document, jQuery);
	</script>
</j:jelly>
